name: KILLUA TROOP MK1 (HYDRA)
description:
EGO NAME : HYDRA
YEAR OF RESURRECTION: 3021 BC
BATTALION: ELDER

Hydra is the first killua troop to rise to read the xerces war situation. Writing historical inscription messages and calculating the possible resurrection of the Killua Corps was Hydra's primary mandate. Hiding and scouting is the top priority after survival. Hydra managed to keep the Killua Corps revival secret plan.
